actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to permit States to combine funds for the maintenance and improvement of rail service continuation programs established under such Act.

summary.text: Amends the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to permit States to combine their entitlements for rail service continuation subsidies in order to improve rail properties within their respective States or regions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to permit States to combine funds for the maintenance and improvement of rail service continuation programs established under such Act.
